Venture Capital

Investments Submit your Start-up

How we operate

One Step Ahead of the current Model

We invest innovatively in exponential entrepreneurs.

We always act with the intention of using our strength to add maximum value to the ecosystem, we were born to change the game.

Hybrid Capital

We evaluate opportunities in both equity and debt, providing alternative sources of capital for entrepreneurs and income for our LPs.

Glass box

We have a completely transparent analysis and screening process for LPs, Family Offices and Corporates.

Smart, then money

We seek to add value even before investing, consequently, more than 30% of our deal flow comes from non-invested companies.

Without labels

We support entrepreneurs who seek to exponentialize their business, period. We don't like labels or pre defined boxes.

Principles connect your values to your actions; they are beacons that guide your actions and help you successfully deal with the laws of reality. It is to your principles that you turn when you face hard choices.

Ray Dalio, Investor

Uncertainty is something present, desirable and necessary for evolution.

Nassim Taleb, Investor

A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity. An optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.

Winston Churchill, former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

Success is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.

Winston Churchill, former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

A man without a purpose is like a ship without a rudder.

Thomas Carlyle, writer

In the new world, it is not the big fish which eats the small fish, it's the fast fish which eats the slow fish.

Klauss Schwab, founder of the World Economic Forum
